titles.title: In The Cross Of Christ I Glory

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: In the cross of Christ I glory, newline Tow'ring o'er the wrecks of time; newline All the light of sacred story newline Gathers round its head sublime.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: When the woes of life o'ertake me, newline Hopes deceive and fears annoy; newline Never shall the cross forsake me, newline Lo! it glows with peace and joy.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: When the sun of bliss is beaming newline Light and love upon my way; newline From the cross the radiance streaming newline Adds more luster to the day.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Bane and blessing, pain and pleasure, newline By the cross are sanctified; newline Peace is there that knows no measure, newline Joys that thro' all time abide.
